item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Eoin, aka YuKitsune. I’m Software Engineer at Octopus Deploy. I’m a big fan of DevOps, automation, software architecture, and privacy. Outside of software, I’m a student pilot, aviation enthusiast, amateur photographer and music producer. You can find me on GitHub or Twitter.
item.content:
I’m Eoin, aka YuKitsune. I’m Software Engineer at Octopus Deploy.

I’m a big fan of DevOps, automation, software architecture, and privacy.

Outside of software, I’m a student pilot, aviation enthusiast, amateur photographer and music producer.

You can find me on GitHub or Twitter.
